mapper.insert:
insert into qt_financial_authentication (id, userId, authType, authStatus, authenticationId, createdAt, updatedAt ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authenticationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
)
mapper.select: select id, userId, authType, authStatus, authenticationId, createdAt,updatedAt from qt_financial_authentication where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
